alert.note: Alert for Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains; Hill County; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains; Northern Blaine County; Snowy and Judith Mountains; Western and Central Chouteau County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 15 at 2:11PM MDT until March 15 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations up to two inches. * WHERE...Portions of central and north central Montana. * WHEN...Until 9 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.
